text: A Family at War is a British drama television series that aired on ITV for 3 seasons and 52 episodes. It ran from 14 April 1970 to 16 February 1972 and starring Colin Douglas, Shelagh Fraser, Colin Campbell, Keith Drinkel, Barbara Flynn, Coral Atkins, David Dixon, John Nettles, Patrick Troughton, Margery Mason, Brett Usher. ==Other websites== * Category:1970 television series debuts Category:1972 television series endings Category:ITV television programmes Category:1970s British drama television series Category:1970s British television series endings
title: A Family at War
